entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mildred Lake

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
